attributes.action: Stop the bias towards the under 25's when providing help with unemployment
attributes.additional_details: It seems that all "Back-to-Work" is geared towards the under 25's.  It seems that those in their 40's who are unemployed should be given priority as they will reach pension age sooner.  Not giving this age-group increased help prevents them from making any form of pension provision, and results in higher burdens on the taxpayer.
